name: A dead world's dream
description: A Dead World's Dream is a challenging retro platformerAs a peaceful alien, explore a harsh world looking for hidden species.Unlocking upgrades and power-ups, travel to even more treacherous places.Carefuly examine your surroundings before jumping toward new dangers and secrets.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8 Processor: Intel i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 100 MB available space Additional Notes: exemple setup the game was tested with

reviews.review_text: i was the first one who played this game and its reaaly good i have made an video to youtube when i played this i recomend it it's fun but it needs s save button
good title, and great game   good luck
